speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0054/2007 ) by Kartika Tamara Liotard, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on a thematic strategy for the sustainable use of natural resources ( 2006/2210(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0054/2007 ) by Kartika Tamara Liotard, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on a thematic strategy for the sustainable use of natural resources ( 2006/2210(INI) ).
agenda_item: Thematic Strategy on the sustainable use of natural resources (debate)
